DOC.brief_title: ED50 ED95 Intrathecal Bupivacaine With Without Epinephrine Total Knee Replacement Arthroplasty
DOC.detailed_description: Patients undergoing total knee replacement arthroplasty randomly assign six bupivacaine dose group ( 6 , 7 , 8 , 9 , 10 , 11 mg ) . Combined spinal-epidural anesthesia would perform . The dose would consider successful epidural supplement require surgery . A probit analysis perform calculate ED50 ED95 intrathecal bupivacaine without epinephrine total knee replacement arthroplasty . After measurement , ED50 ED95 bupivacaine epinephrine would compare without epinephrine .
